# Bytes    Format Units       Label  Explanations
# --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
#   13- 18 F6.4   ---         zabs   Absorption redshift of DLA
#   20- 24 F5.2   [cm-2]      NHI    Log of the hydrogen column density
#   26- 29 F4.2   [cm-2]    e_NHI    Error in NHI
#   31- 35 F5.2   [-]         [M/H]  Log of "M" to hydrogen number abundance
#   37- 40 F4.2   [-]       e_[M/H]  Error in [M/H]
#   67- 69 I3     km/s        DelV   Velocity width (assumed error 10km/s)
#   f_mean/median
#   f_edge
#  55- 59 F5.3   0.1nm     EW     equivalent width of Si II 1526
#                                  line; Angstroms
#  61- 65 F5.3   0.1nm   e_EW     Error in ew; Angstroms
# --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
